alert.note: Alert for Eastern Cherry; Western Cherry (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 3:56AM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Cherry County through 445 AM CDT... At 356 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Kilgore, or 15 miles west of Valentine, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Valentine, Kilgore, Crookston, Wood Lake and Highway 97 crossing the Niobrara River. This includes the following highways... Highway 20 between mile markers 176 and 222. Highway 97 between mile markers 130 and 141. Highway 83 between mile markers 201 and 217. Highway 12 between mile markers 1 and 4. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
